discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ABCE
Important data to track in SAM:
- Entitlements: license metrics, purchased rights, active rights, allocations available
- Allocations: user, device
- Software model: publisher, product, suite information, entitlements, End of Life
- Foundation data: users, departments, cost centers, locations, vendors

Selected Answer: ABCE
Sam Pro Fundamentals course, Trustworthy Data overview, Data tracking
ABCE. Page 69 study guide.
Yep. ABCE. Trustworthy data section of the Now Learning course for SAM Pro Fundamentals.

Selected Answer: ABCE
This is correct based on the Lesson in Now learning
ABCE is the correct answer.
Should be ABDE

comments.content: Wrong. ABCE. Contracts are NOT included.

questions.question_text: Which of the following data elements are key to an effective Software Asset Management practice within ServiceNow? (Choose four.)

choices.A: Plugins can be disabled or deactivated when no longer in use.
choices.B: Plugins can be activated by default in the base ServiceNow system.
choices.C: When a plugin is active you cannot hide its functionality.
choices.E: Plugins are software components that provide specific features and functionalities.
choices.D: Plugins are stand-alone and do not depend on other plugins being activated.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BE
Plugins are software components that provide specific features and functionalities. Plugins may be enabled in one of the following ways:

Activated by default in the base ServiceNow system.
Activated by an admin user (not by default) through the ServiceNow Plugin list.
Requested from ServiceNow (for plugins with additional licensing requirements).

Selected Answer: BE
B and E correct, from SAM Fundamentals > SAM Product Overview
B and E are actually correct. (From page 29 in the text from the course)
A and E are the Right answers

comments.content:
A is definitely wrong. 

From the text: 'After a plugin is active, it cannot be disabled or deactivated. The functionality, however, may be hidden.'

questions.question_text: Which of the following are true of plugins? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: E. Asset Tag is the correct answer. (the proof is on page 348 of the text book included in the SAM pro course)

Selected Answer: E
Right answer is E, based on servicenow SAM Fundamentals Course on operation integration module

Selected Answer: E
Receive purchase orders: When receiving software entitlements, the asset tag, serial number, and license keys can be updated directly from the receiving popup.

Asset Tag is a required field. If the organization does not have asset tag software, consider having the purchasing product automatically generate a unique asset tag number.

Receive purchase orders: When receiving software entitlements, the asset tag, serial number, and license keys can be updated directly from the receiving popup.

Asset Tag is a required field. If the organization does not have asset tag software, consider having the purchasing product automatically generate a unique asset tag number.

Selected Answer: E
Asset Tag is mandatory

Selected Answer: E
Receive purchase orders:
i. When receiving software entitlements, the asset tag, serial number, and license keys can be updated directly from the receiving popup.
ii. Asset Tag is a required field. If the organization does not have asset tag software, consider having the purchasing product automatically generate a unique asset tag number.
iii. When items are received, an entitlement will be automatically created with the number of active rights identified as received. The rights will then need to be allocated.
D. ( License Key) is the right answer

questions.question_text: When receiving software related to a purchase order in ServiceNow, which data point is mandatory?

choices.F: List of all publishers out of compliance

questions.question_text: Which of the following are NOT features of the Publisher workbench navigation tree? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BF
Answer B and F
This is for Vancover:
The navigation tree features are:
Filter products (active filtering, including collapsed items)
Compliance toggle switch
Expand and collapse tree links
Software model compliance icons

https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-it-asset-management/page/product/software-asset-management2/concept/sam-license-workbench.html

Selected Answer: BF
B and F are correct because those 2 options are specific for the License workbench and not the Publisher workbench. 
https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/utah-it-asset-management/page/product/software-asset-management2/concept/sam-license-workbench.html

Selected Answer: AC
https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/utah-it-asset-management/page/product/software-asset-management2/concept/sam-license-workbench.html
Correct answer: ACDE
The navigation tree features are:
Filter products (active filtering, including collapsed items)
Compliance toggle switch
Expand and collapse tree links
Software model compliance icons

comments.content: The question is asking which of the following are NOT features. Therefore the correct answer is B and F because those are the descriptions of the features in the license workbench navigation tree.
